title: Corrupting replay files
body: A game i wanna see the recording of says that the file is corrupted and that I need to delete it and redownload. Anyone know how id go about doing that..

replies.body: The replay system is still in testing, so it's possible to run into problems like this.  Keep in mind as well that replays from previous patches will no longer be available as well.  Report this to our [client discussions](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards to our client devs can take a look into why the file might be corrupted.  Thanks for your help!
